name: Ghost Attack!
description:
Armed with a single battery and a flashlight, you venture into the haunted mansion... Hide in fridges and under bedsheets, collect batteries and flash away the frightening ghost to win! Will you expell the ghost, or will the ghost expell YOU?

Ghost Attack! is a survival horror arcade game which can be played with up to two players locally. Everytime the player uses his flash attack, they lose one battery. Since only one battery can be stored at the time, the player is forced to carefully weigh their options when it comes to avoiding or engaging the ghost. When the ghost spots you without your batteries, run and hide! Make sure not to hide while in sight, or the ghost will know your hiding place. To win, use your flashlight to strike at the ghost three times in a row!

Controls: O - Search object X - Flash LEFT - Walk left RIGHT - Walk right UP - Hide | Go upstairs DOWN - Unhide | Go downstairs

Since this game was made with the Pico8 engine, the above controls are relative to Pico8. To see how these are mapped to your device, while in game, press enter, go to options  and select controls. Here you can view the different controls per player and see the respective button presses on screen.
